column4: thats odd... with the live cd, sound worked... but once installed, it doesnt hehe
check that all the levels are up in alsamixer , and make sure your user has permision to use the sound device
restricted drivers might also be an issue
im using restricted drivers for wlan and graphics
if your sound card is also a nvidia or ati chipset that might also be an issue but what do I know
sound card is from connexant / intel hd audio
